Description: Small stone (basalt ?) axe of tear-drop shape. There is slight damage near the top of the axe.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Northern Dongola Reach, Site U01 locus 12011
Bibliographic references: Welsby 2001 / The Small Finds (679, p.377, fig. 7.8)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-24 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Acquisition name: Donated by: National Corporation for Antiquities and Museums (NCAM)
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: SF:3229 (small find number)
